CustomField.description: Allows you to decide to let SurveyVista send email or configure your process/flow to send email, when a survey result / invitation is created for a participant.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose your preferred notification method for survey invitations. Choose 'Do Not Send Email' to opt out of email notifications entirely. Opt for 'This Survey Settings' to have SurveyVista manage the email delivery process. Alternatively, you can select a specific flow, like 'Ardira Survey Assignment - Notify Participant' or utilize a custom flow to handle email notifications according to your specific requirements.
